data.title: Driver monitoring gets spotlight amid safety questions
data.description: Two leaders in motor vehicle safety testing said Thursday that they will rate the driver monitoring systems that are supposed to help make technologies like Tesla's Autopilot safe.

data.title: Tudor portfolio manager on where she's finding alpha in the tech sector with rising rates
data.description: Ulrike Hoffmann-Burchardi recently launched a new fund within Tudor Investment Corp. called T++ with a specific focus on technology stocks.

data.title: Amazon bets you're tired of just buying clothes off Amazon
data.description: Amazon has a new venture outside of e-commerce, cloud computing, content streaming, smart devices, Whole Foods, cashier-less technology or anything else you've come to associate with one of the most successful companies in American history.

data.title: 5G vs. airline safety: This is why we have a government
data.description: The promise of 5G, the next generation of wireless technology, has excited people for a long time -- faster internet, better connections and easier access. But the potential danger of the rollout in the US is just becoming clear, including the possible malfunction of certain instruments on airplanes.

data.title: Europe rolled out 5G without hurting aviation. Here's how
data.description: Major international airlines are canceling flights to the United States over aviation industry fears that 5G technology could interfere with crucial onboard instruments.

data.title: What is C-band 5G? Verizon and AT&T are flipping on the switch in the US
data.description: The next-generation of wireless technology is now even faster for 5G users in some parts of the country.
